column3:
旅人さんなら知っているかしら…

この馬宿の北東ウォルナー山を越えた先に
昼でも暗い遺跡が あるわよ！
ただ あの森に挑んで帰ってきた人はいないの…
やめておいた方がいいわね！
あなたみたいな人が… ずっと泊まっていてもらえると
うれしいし… うふ…
column4:
Since you're a traveler, you should
probably know this:

On the other side of Mount Drena,
northeast of this stable, there are
ruins that are dark even during the day!
I've never met anyone who's been in
there, so either no one has ever gone
in...or no one has ever come out!
Or maybe I just haven't met everyone
yet... But in any case, you'd best forget
about going in there!
You should probably stay here forever just to be
safe. Teehee!

column3:
暗い夜道が危ないのは
旅人さんの常識ですよね！ですけど…
この馬宿の北東ウォルナー山を越えた先に
昼でも夜でも真っ暗な遺跡があるわよ！
けど あそこに行って帰ってきた人はいないの！
やめておいた方が いいわ！
あなたみたいな人が…ずっと泊まっていてもらえると
うれしいし… うふ…
column4:
It's just common sense that traveling
dark roads at night is dangerous!

But on the other side of Mount Drena,
northeast of this stable, there are
ruins that are dark even during the day!
But no one who has gone there has
ever come back! So you'd best forget
about going there!
You could always...stay here with me forever.
Teehee...

column3:
こんな日は このマリッタ馬宿で
ゆっくりマッタリ休憩なさってくださいね！
巨大クジラの研究をしている この3人も
この馬宿に ずっと泊まり続けているのよ！
まあ…私目当てだというのは ミエミエですけど… うふ…
column4:
Nothing to do in this weather but stay
here at Serenne Stable and relax.

That's probably why these leviathan
researchers are here at the stable.

And because they TOTALLY have a thing for me...
Teehee!

column3: あらあら ひどい天気ですわね！
column4: Oh, my! This weather is dreadful!

column3: あらあら こんな夜更けにお疲れ様です！
column4:
Oh, my! Good seeing you so late at
night!

column3:
あらあら長旅お疲れ様です！

あなたもクジラの骨を探す冒険家さんかしら？
違ったらごめんなさいね！
column4:
Oh, my, you must be tired from your long
trip!

Are you another of those leviathan
researchers? You don't look the type.
